Class ValidateMap

java.lang.Object
model.ValidateMap
public class ValidateMap extends Object
In this class, the map is validated.

  • Method Details

    • createGraph

      public org.jgrapht.Graph<TerritoryDetails,org.jgrapht.graph.DefaultEdge> createGraph(GameMap p_map)
      Uses the jgrapht package to create a graph by adding edges between each territory and its neighbors, starting with the territories as vertices.
      Parameters:
      p_map - Game map representing territories ,continents and borders.
      Returns:
      returns graph representing the map

    • createSubGraph

      A continent's subgraph is created using this function.
      Parameters:
      p_subGraph - subgraph for a continent
      p_territories - territories of a continent
      Returns:
      p_subGraph

    • continentConnectCheck

      public boolean continentConnectCheck(GameMap p_map)
      Determines whether or not every continent is connected to a subgraph
      Parameters:
      p_map - GameMap object representing the game map
      Returns:
      true if all continents are connected sub-graph, else false indicating incorrect map

    • isTerritoryExist

      public static boolean isTerritoryExist(GameMap p_map, String p_territoryId)
      Verify whether the same territory already exists.
      Parameters:
      p_map - GameMap object holding record of all the existing continents and territories
      p_territoryId - name of the territory to be checked
      Returns:
      true if territory already exists, else false

    • isContinentExists

      public static boolean isContinentExists(GameMap p_map, String p_continentId)
      Verify whether the continent is already occupied.
      Parameters:
      p_map - GameMap object holding record of all the existing continents and territories
      p_continentId - name of the continent to be checked
      Returns:
      true if continent already exists, else false

    • notEmptyContinent

      public boolean notEmptyContinent(GameMap p_map)
      Examine whether any continent is empty and does not hold any territory.
      Parameters:
      p_map - GameMap object representing the game map
      Returns:
      true if no continent is empty, else false indicating empty continent
